title: Hi, I'm Peer, the Software Engineer!
description: My name is Peer de Bakker. My tech journey started at Codam Amsterdam, where I wrote my first lines of code. After finishing my Bachelor's, I worked at Panartis, then returned to finish my Master's at 42 Paris â€” where I was exposed to AI and Cybersecurity. Now I'm a Software Engineer and Data Engineer at Auguria.io, building data pipelines that process billions of records.
